attributes.action: Fully investigate the safety and enviromnental issues associated with Low energy lightbulbs before implimenting the ban on incandescent bulbs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Low Energy light bulbs potentially pose a risk to the health and safety of users; increased wastage and, therefore, use of raw materials; problems in disposal, and unneccessary expenditure to consumers.
